ComicInfo.Title: Youth Gone Wild Chapter 1
ComicInfo.Summary: Youth Gone Wild Chapter 1: Badly abused teenage serial killer, Ernest Fairchild, is in Clearview Mental Institution under the watchful care of Dr. Leonard Price. Price has already put him through a bout of dream therapy where Ernest met the lovely Lady Death which only proved to make him more homicidal. Now, Mary Young visits the institute and observes Ernest's ultra-violence first hand. She is convinced that he is perfect for an experimental treatment which will cure him of his manic ways forever.
